title: The Reason Kled Was Disabled Answer Thread
body: There was a gamebreaking Kled bug that allowed Kled to become immune to all sources of damage and cc for as long as he dismounted. He is currently disabled and the bug is getting fixed, so I decided that I can share it with you guys now.

replies.body:
OMG IM KLED MAIN LVL 7 AND YOU CANT JUST DISABLE MY MAIN???    
{{champion:240}}
I'm a mod in Kled mains Discord and me revealing this to my Discord may have unintentionally gotten Kled disabled :(
You sound like a gamebreaking abusble bug getting a champ disabled is a bad thing only because he was disabled.
Better to reveal it than have him disabled after it's abused a lot.
There already was a video of the bug yesterday on the League Reddit.  Riot probably already had it on the radar.
And it would seem as if no one cared.

I cared. Shit, I had plans to play some yoloqueue, and I've been two-tricking Kled this season.

I'm mad.
